def pathSum(root, sum):
    def dfs(node, path, cur_sum):
        if not node:
            return
        cur_sum += node.val
        path.append(node.val)
        if cur_sum == sum:
            result.append(path[:])
        dfs(node.left, path, cur_sum)
        dfs(node.right, path, cur_sum)
        path.pop()
    result = []
    dfs(root, [], 0)
    return result
